channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: A Spotify Beta Feature Lets Users Make Custom Playlists by Writing AI Prompts
item.description: "Prompted Playlists" are currently only available in New Zealand.

item.title: Hinge adds AI-inspired Convo Starters to help daters stop overthinking the first message
item.description: Hinge's new AI-powered Convo Starters aims to take the pressure off the dreaded first message by offering smart, personalized tips based on each profile.

item.title: Nvidia: Reports of an Elaborate Chinese GPU Smuggling Operation Are ‘Far-fetched’
item.description: Deepseek reportedly received banned chips, and is allegedly using them to train a new model.

item.title: Pokémon Legends: Z-A’s Mega Dimension DLC is more of the same — for better and worse
item.description: I loved Pokémon Legends: Z-A, but a couple hours into Mega Dimension DLC I’m disappointed for 2 big reasons.
